entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 10:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: N 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
